ValueSet-IMMZD18SCholeraWCRBSVaccine3Dos.title: IMMZD18SCholeraWCRBSVaccine3Doses ValueSet for Decision Table Schema
ValueSet-IMMZD18SCholeraWCRBSVaccine3Dos.description: JSON Schema for IMMZD18SCholeraWCRBSVaccine3Doses ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Three doses from primary series were administered. The primary series has been completed-93
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Primary series for cholera has been completed and latest cholera dose was administered approximately less than 6 months ago-295
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Booster dose was administered approximately less than 6 months ago-176
ValueSet-IMMZD18SCholeraWCRBSVaccine3Dos.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD18SCholeraWCRBSVaccine3Doses ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD18SCholeraWCRBSVaccine3DosesVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
